author: edwingo
msg: Synced up javax.xml.parsers package with latest code from xml-commons
module.  This fixes a number of bugs such as:
+ Code runs on non-ASCII platforms such as OS/390
+ Code is parser neutral and does not mention a specific fallback parser
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch 'xerces_j_1'.

author: neilg
msg: porting patch from Sam Ruby <rubys@apache.org> to permit compilation under JDK 1.4.0 (and to make it faster as well) to Xerces2.
